attributes.action: ensure that the "high jump" is part of every school child's PE curriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The high jump was banned during my time at school on health and safety grounds (despite it being the only sport that I was half decent at).  No child should be made to miss out on sports due to spurious health and safety concerns.

Who better than the current Prime Minister to restore the high jump to its rightful place in children's sporting life.
